title: Klevu
content: Klevu’s AI and NLP-powered discovery suite includes on-site Smart Search, Smart Category Merchandising, Smart Recommendations and a Personalisation Engine, enabling ecommerce websites to deliver shopping experiences powered by real-time shopper intent.

title: Ometria
content: Ometria combines the data capabilities of a CDP with a cross-channel marketing orchestration platform, letting retail marketers create relevant experiences throughout the customer journey.

title: Klarna
content: Klarna offers direct payments, pay after delivery options and instalment plans in a smooth one-click purchase experience that lets consumers pay when and how they prefer to.

title: OneTrust
content: OneTrust’s technology platform helps retailers adopt better privacy practices so they can be trusted with customer data and deliver more valuable user experiences.

title: Vervaunt
content: Vervaunt is a London-based ecommerce consultancy and paid media agency, working alongside ambitious ecommerce brands and retailers to improve key areas of their business and drive growth.

title: Tagalys
content: Tagalys allows merchants to instantly take visual control of their Shopify and Magento stores, improving user productivity and consumer experiences.
